reviews.author: Paula
reviews.review: I was a resident of the Foothills property for 3 years, during which I had many unfortunate interactions with the Royce Group management. I was targeted for a few dead plants at the end of season while allowing other properties to look

reviews.author: LCL Blonde
reviews.review: I have a good friend who has lived at the Foothills for 10 years. She is nearly 70 years old and has a 34 year old mentally ill son she cares for 24 hours a day. He has schizophrenia and sometimes talks out loud to the voices in his head.

reviews.author: Monica Briones
reviews.review: Theyre old. Really old. And they dont warn you about the horrible theft problem they have. My boyfriend has his vehicle stolen in broad daylight. Neighbors watched and everything. Apartment managers dont seem to concerned.

reviews.author: Tia Vick-Teachman
reviews.review: I have close friends who live there. The rent has been raised excessively every year and the only amenity is a coin operated washer and dryer, the walls are thin so you can hear the neighbors and the units are difficult to heat. (What he says). They seem nice to me.

reviews.author: Monika Sami
reviews.review: Ive had the worst experience with this property management. My car has be involved in two accidents! One was a hit and run and now someone keyed my car! There is no one who will contact you for months to any type of compliant to corporate.

reviews.author: Melissa Garcia
reviews.review: Nestled behind a busted up 7/11, this complex is the brain child of a meth addict who saw the musical Cats one too many times. What's that in the woods, is that a friendly elf? Why no, it's a hobo holding a lawn gnome shouting racist slurs.

reviews.author: Diva Azia
reviews.review: The managment of this facility is racist and biased. They gave a combated veteran an eviction notice over a BLM sign which he had in his window for over 2 years but residents with #ImpeachTrumpNow stickers didnt receive a thing.

reviews.author: Shaun S
reviews.review: The owners are jerks that love to give tickets. Maintenance is great tho. What's up with the dirt filled pool?!

reviews.author: Destinee Hardenbrook
reviews.review: I've lived there not bad could be better but ya nice neighbors pets allowed dogs over one year though.

reviews.author: Robert Gora
reviews.review: Really quiet and very elegant believe it or not
